pros: Friendly teams. Lots of chance for development. Approachable and visible management. I have worked in a lot of hospitals and this is one of the best.
cons: The only cons are those that are unavoidable with the pressures the NHS currently faces. KGH still puts staff working conditions and patient safety as a priority despite these.

pros: Very difficult to find, Kettering Hospital encourages staff to join with recruitment retention allowance but even that does not keep staff staying too long.
